Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli

Class TextScene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.TextScene
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseResourcesScene, DevCardPurchaseScene, EndOfMatchScene, LeaderCardScene, MarketScene, ProductionScene, TurnStatusScene, WaitingListScene, WaitingTurnScene
public abstract class TextScene
extends java.lang.Object
A CLI scene representing a specific stage of the player's turn

    Draws CLI scene - Scene specific
    boolean getGoBackRequest()
    Checks whether or not the Player has requested to go back to the previous scene (only applicable to TurnStatusScene, MarketScene, DevCardPurchaseScene and ProductionScene) WARNING: The flag is set to false after calling this method
    protected void registerGoBackRequest()
    Registers that the player has requested to go to the previous scene (only applicable to TurnStatusScene, MarketScene, DevCardPurchaseScene and ProductionScene)

    Converts a String array to a regular String (adds \n after each line)
